website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for a soft topper designed to keep you cool.
pros: Consumers commented on the soft and luxurious feel of this topper, with many claiming it kept them cool during the night and was still supportive despite its softness
cons: some felt it did not keep them cool or wasn't comfortable enough

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable - Does not help to Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in order to help me deal with the night heat of menopause. It does not help with the cooling factor, as a matter of fact, I think it made it worse. I have only slept on it for 2 nights, maybe it will get better? For comfort, this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Evoy

customer_reviews.title: it will be great.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something that will pull body heat away from the surface this is not it. In fact, it traps heat where your body rests in the foam. If you are just looking for a foam top, it will be great.

customer_reviews.title: It is a POS!
customer_reviews.text: Update... after a month of use it started breaking down, by 6 months my back hurt again and by 10 months it was completely broken down and useless .I bought this because my mattress is crappy and I can't afford a new one. I've been having back pain and haven't been able to sleep. It has made my back feel so much better and my quality of sleep is also better. The only issues is it makes me warmer than usual while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Greenstein

customer_reviews.title: They love it! The mattress ' are for bunk beds
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandsons bunk beds. Arrived very quickly (a day before scheduled). Upon opening them, there was no odor that other reviews pointed out about other brands. They love it! The mattress ' are for bunk beds, so they are a little hard. These soften them up considerably. They come to both sides and top and bottom. Price was GREAT! Since these are four inches thick, you will need deep pocket mattress pads and sheets. Comes with a 5 year prorated warranty.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons
